message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this great product. I think it would be perfect for you and I'm hoping we can make a deal. My initial offer is $14,000.
I appreciate your offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $10,000. I think that's a fair price for this product.
Bob, I appreciate your interest but $10,000 is too low. I'm willing to come down a bit to $13,000. This product is really worth it, and I'm confident you'll be happy with it.
I understand that you think the product is worth it, but I'm still a bit hesitant at $13,000. I'm willing to meet you halfway, so I'll offer $11,500. Can we meet at this price?
